scripts.build:client: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "Clean,Build" -c "bgRed.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run clean" "parcel build src/views/*.pug --no-cache --no-source-maps --detailed-report --out-dir dist"
scripts.dev: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "Clean,Client,Server" -c "bgRed.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgCyan.bold" "npm run clean" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server"
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "Clean,Client,Server" -c "bgRed.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgCyan.bold" "npm run clean" "npm run build:client" "npm run build:server"
